title: Research Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the job online. I sent my resume and even a cover letter. The interviewer reached out to me as to arrange a virtual interview due to Covid restrictions. The interviewer was a nice lady, A typical job interview. Asked some questions about myself such as educational background, experience, interests.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself. Why should we hire you? What is your prior experience?

title: Development Relations Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Seed Company in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: The whole process was very thorough and left no stone unturned. I had a total of 4 encounters. I call them encounters because one or two of them felt more like a way for them to feel me out and get to know me rather than a formal interview. Some may feel like 4 interviews was a lot but I think that it allowed me to get to know the team before I even got hired. Which gave me the opportunity to decide if this was a group of people I could work with.
Interview Questions: Do you work better in a team or individually?

title: Information Security Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Seed Company in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Great professional staff seeking to get the best-qualified candidate.  Interviewer focused on applicants whole person concepts to include technical proficiency. Interviewer focused on applicants whole person concepts to include technical proficiency.
Interview Questions: How my faith has helped me throughout my career.

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Seed Company
Interview Descriptions: It took a total of 3 months to get hired on with Seed Company. I also interviewed with about 3 people including HR. Although I would've preferred to start my employment sooner, I appreciated their thorough evaluation before presenting me with an offer.
Interview Questions: Do I believe in Jesus Christ?
